classifications.name: Dragon
classifications.description: Draconic or dinosaur-like creatures with scales, horns, wings, and claws. Typically favor rocky, mountainous environments.

classifications.name: Beast
classifications.description: Mammalian animal-like Animon with fur, paws, or prominent ears. Often found in fields and grasslands.

classifications.name: Avian
classifications.description: Bird-like Animon with feathers, wings, beaks, or talons. Prefer skyward and aerial environments.

classifications.name: Insect
classifications.description: Insectoid Animon resembling bugs or arachnids. Often have chitin, multiple legs, or wings. Thrive in forests and jungles.

classifications.name: Plant
classifications.description: Floral or botanical Animon with vines, flowers, or roots. Found in lush, vegetation-rich environments.

classifications.name: Aquatic
classifications.description: Fish-like or marine Animon with fins, scales, or thick fur. Adapted to lakes, rivers, and oceanic zones.

classifications.name: Celestial
classifications.description: Radiant, angelic Animon with glowing features or holy relics. Dwell near shrines, temples, and sacred places.

classifications.name: Infernal
classifications.description: Demonic or fiendish Animon with horns, dark wings, or flame-like features. Prefer wastelands or volcanic regions.

classifications.name: Machine
classifications.description: Mechanical or cybernetic Animon with gears, plating, or full robotic forms. Common in cities and industrial zones.

classifications.name: Fairy
classifications.description: Fey-inspired Animon like pixies, gnomes, or sylphs. Use illusions and magic. Live in enchanted, supernatural areas.

classifications.name: Nightmare
classifications.description: Spooky or ghostly Animon like ghouls, goblins, or specters. Inhabit ruins, abandoned buildings, and haunted locales.

classifications.name: Unknown
classifications.description: Animon that defy categorization. Often amorphous or bizarre. Their favored habitats vary greatly.

stats.name: Power
stats.description: Measures the Animon's raw strength and energy. Affects how much damage they deal.

stats.name: Heart
stats.description: Represents vitality and endurance. Determines HP and resilience.

stats.name: Brains
stats.description: Indicates intelligence, wit, and perception. Governs Initiative and Signature Attack usage.

stats.name: Agility
stats.description: Reflects swiftness and reflexes. Used for Dodging attacks and reacting quickly.

signature_attack_effects.name: Block-Break
signature_attack_effects.description: Deal half damage and make the target Vulnerable (Setback on Dodge).

signature_attack_effects.name: Efficient
signature_attack_effects.description: First use each combat doesn’t consume a use.

signature_attack_effects.name: Energy Drain
signature_attack_effects.description: Heal HP equal to target’s Level when dealing damage.

signature_attack_effects.name: Explosive
signature_attack_effects.description: Deal Level damage to adjacent enemies when hitting the main target.

signature_attack_effects.name: Heavy Strike
signature_attack_effects.description: Deal extra damage equal to 1 + Rank on a hit.

signature_attack_effects.name: Misdirect
signature_attack_effects.description: Disorient target (Setback on Attack rolls) instead of damage.

signature_attack_effects.name: Multi-Element
signature_attack_effects.description: Choose between multiple elements for the attack.

signature_attack_effects.name: Multi-Hit
signature_attack_effects.description: Hit multiple enemies by spending extra uses (1 target per use).

signature_attack_effects.name: Poison Strike
signature_attack_effects.description: Poison the target to deal Power damage each turn.

signature_attack_effects.name: Overcharge
signature_attack_effects.description: Spend extra uses to multiply damage, but become Incapacitated.

signature_attack_effects.name: Power Transfer
signature_attack_effects.description: Buff nearby allies with Boost for 1 turn.

signature_attack_effects.name: Quick Strike
signature_attack_effects.description: Gain Boost if target hasn’t acted yet.

signature_attack_effects.name: Sap
signature_attack_effects.description: Weaken target (half damage dealt) instead of damage.

signature_attack_effects.name: Stunning Strike
signature_attack_effects.description: Stun the target to make them skip next turn.

signature_attack_effects.name: Sure Strike
signature_attack_effects.description: On miss, still deal half damage.

qualities.name: Forcefield
qualities.description: Create protective energy barriers to block attacks

rank_effects.2: Block 2 attacks per battle
rank_effects.3: Block 3 attacks per battle or 1 area attack

qualities.name: Rocket Launcher
qualities.description: Launch explosive projectiles at enemies

rank_effects.2: Deal +2 damage or hit adjacent enemy
rank_effects.3: Deal +3 damage or hit all adjacent enemies

qualities.name: Healing Touch
qualities.description: Restore HP to self or allies through physical contact

rank_effects.2: Heal 3 HP twice per battle
rank_effects.3: Heal 4 HP three times per battle

qualities.name: Danger Sense
qualities.description: Detect threats and ambushes before they happen

rank_effects.2: Gain +1 Initiative when danger is present
rank_effects.3: Warn allies, granting party +1 Initiative

qualities.name: Natural Armour
qualities.description: Thick hide, scales, or shell provides natural protection

rank_effects.2: Reduce all damage by 2 (minimum 1)
rank_effects.3: Reduce all damage by 3 (minimum 1)

qualities.name: Flight
qualities.description: Ability to fly and maneuver in three dimensions

rank_effects.1: Fly short distances, avoid ground hazards
rank_effects.2: Sustained flight, +1 Dodge vs ground attacks
rank_effects.3: Expert aerial combat, +2 Dodge vs ground attacks

qualities.name: Telekinesis
qualities.description: Move objects with mental power alone

rank_effects.1: Move small objects, manipulate simple mechanisms
rank_effects.2: Move medium objects, disarm opponents
rank_effects.3: Move large objects, throw multiple items as attacks

qualities.name: Camouflage
qualities.description: Blend into surroundings to avoid detection

rank_effects.2: Hide in any environment, +1 to stealth
rank_effects.3: Near-invisibility, +2 to stealth and first attack

qualities.name: Teleport
qualities.description: Instantly move from one location to another

rank_effects.2: Medium-range teleport twice per battle
rank_effects.3: Long-range teleport three times per battle

qualities.name: Counterattack
qualities.description: Strike back immediately when attacked

rank_effects.1: Counter once per battle when hit
rank_effects.2: Counter twice per battle when hit
rank_effects.3: Counter every time hit, but at -1 damage

qualities.name: Pack Tactics
qualities.description: Fight more effectively alongside allies

rank_effects.2: +1 damage and +1 accuracy when ally is adjacent
rank_effects.3: +2 damage and +1 accuracy when any ally is nearby

qualities.name: Thick Hide
qualities.description: Tough skin provides resistance to physical attacks

rank_effects.2: Resist 2 points of physical damage
rank_effects.3: Resist 3 points of physical damage

qualities.name: Quick Reflexes
qualities.description: React faster than normal in combat situations

rank_effects.2: +2 Initiative and can act twice on first turn
rank_effects.3: +3 Initiative and always act first

qualities.name: Elemental Body
qualities.description: Body is composed of or infused with elemental energy

rank_effects.1: Immune to own element, +1 damage with element attacks
rank_effects.2: Resist opposing elements, +2 damage with element attacks
rank_effects.3: Absorb own element for healing, +3 damage with element attacks

qualities.name: Burrowing
qualities.description: Dig through earth and stone to move underground

rank_effects.2: Burrow through hard earth and soft stone
rank_effects.3: Burrow through any material, emerge for surprise attacks

qualities.name: Intimidating Presence
qualities.description: Natural aura that frightens and unnerves enemies

rank_effects.1: Weak enemies may flee or hesitate
rank_effects.2: Enemies take -1 to attack rolls when first engaged
rank_effects.3: All enemies take -1 to attack rolls throughout combat

qualities.name: Regeneration
qualities.description: Rapidly heal wounds and recover from damage

rank_effects.1: Heal 1 HP at start of each turn
rank_effects.2: Heal 2 HP at start of each turn
rank_effects.3: Heal 3 HP at start of each turn, regrow lost limbs

qualities.name: Energy Absorption
qualities.description: Absorb and redirect various forms of energy

rank_effects.1: Absorb energy attacks for half damage
rank_effects.2: Absorb energy attacks for no damage, store 1 charge
rank_effects.3: Absorb energy attacks for healing, store 2 charges

qualities.name: Phase Shift
qualities.description: Temporarily become incorporeal to avoid attacks

rank_effects.1: Become incorporeal for 1 turn, once per battle
rank_effects.2: Become incorporeal for 1 turn, twice per battle
rank_effects.3: Become incorporeal for 2 turns, twice per battle

qualities.name: Multi-Limb
qualities.description: Additional arms, tentacles, or appendages for extra actions

rank_effects.1: Make one extra simple action per turn
rank_effects.2: Make one extra attack or complex action per turn
rank_effects.3: Make two extra actions of any type per turn

quality_categories.name: Attack
quality_categories.description: Offensive abilities that enhance combat damage or provide new attack options

quality_categories.name: Defense
quality_categories.description: Protective abilities that reduce damage or provide defensive options

quality_categories.name: Support
quality_categories.description: Abilities that help allies or provide team benefits

quality_categories.name: Movement
quality_categories.description: Abilities that enhance mobility and positioning

quality_categories.name: Utility
quality_categories.description: Versatile abilities that provide various practical benefits

quality_categories.name: Stealth
quality_categories.description: Abilities focused on hiding, sneaking, and avoiding detection

quality_categories.name: Mental
quality_categories.description: Abilities that affect minds, emotions, or psychological states

quality_categories.name: Healing
quality_categories.description: Abilities that restore HP or cure negative conditions

quality_categories.name: Special
quality_categories.description: Unique abilities that don't fit other categories

quality_categories.name: Speed
quality_categories.description: Abilities that enhance reaction time and action speed
